entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
